New Records: South Africa posted a brace of World Cup records against Sri Lanka - the highest total of 428 for 5, and the fastest century, an exquisite 49-ball filleting from Aiden Markram
Key Match Events: England were bowled out for 170 in 22 overs, with Gus Atkinson scoring 35 off 21 balls
Pre-Game Insights: England are in danger of dissolving in a bisque of self-doubt
South Africa look a cut above their off-colour opponents
Ben Stokes is all set to play against South Africa and will creak his way back into the fray to shore up a team that's running out of wriggle room
Quinton de Kock already has two hundreds in this World Cup and has started in a rare old mood
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's captain Temba Bavuma said the team will seek to send out a message of 'don't panic!' after their loss to the Netherlands
Jos Buttler backed Chris Woakes to come good despite his rough start to the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first track of the tournament will surely offer runs in abundance
Mumbai's had to wait two weeks to get into the World Cup spirit
It's 25 years since England and South Africa last played international cricket and rugby on the same day
